sense.def:
A saddle
je usnjen sedež, na katerem sedimo, ko jahamo konja ali drugo žival.

seg.quote: Jennifer swung herself into the saddle.

sense.def:
A saddle
je tudi sedež na kolesu ali motorju.
sense.QP:
glej slikovno prilogo
CAR AND BICYCLE
.

sense.def:
To saddle a horse or pony
pomeni dati sedlo na konja ali ponija.

To saddle up
pomeni dati sedlo na konja ali ponija.

seg.quote: I saddled up and rode off.
He went out to saddle up his horse.

sense.def:
To saddle someone with a problem or responsibility
pomeni nekoga postaviti v položaj, ko mora reševati težavo ali nositi odgovornost za kaj.

seg.quote: The last thing I want is to saddle myself with a second mortgage.
